posts.post_content:
Thanks Everyone!

$SOLD$.
First one to say "I'll take it", It's There's!

"Thanks in advance"
Is'nt this still for sale on Ebay? I ask because it's still in my cart. Nice sell!

[quote name="jthorst75" post=979481]Is'nt this still for sale on Ebay? I ask because it's still in my cart. Nice sell![/QUOTE]

Not anymore... :D

sorry i missed this earlier...
would you mind sharing the sale price with me?
thanks for your help.
I hope erick got it!!!he deserved that card...............:D
It wasn't me... but not for a lack of trying over the past few months.  If the new owner wants to move it for trade, I'd be interested...

[quote name="t206hound" post=979636]It wasn't me... but not for a lack of trying over the past few months.  If the new owner wants to move it for trade, I'd be interested...[/QUOTE]

I think we both tried extremely hard to place the card in you collection! In the end I almost got what I had into it and you didn't come close to that offer. Just sayin...

It lasted about a Whole minute on the BST.

Trust me, I feel bad that you didn't end up with the card!  

I've been on both ends and I believe we all wish we could help each other out when ever possible... This was just one time that it just didn't work out... 

I am truly sorry Erik...

Definitely no hard feelings Denny.  I know that you really worked with me to try to make a deal.  We must have tried half a dozen different combinations of trade and cash.  Sometimes it just doesn't work out.  In the end, everyone involved in the deal should be happy, and that appears to have happened with this card.  Congrats to both the buyer and seller.

[quote name="irishdenny" post=979669]I think we both tried extremely hard to place the card in you collection! In the end I almost got what I had into it and you didn't come close to that offer. Just sayin...

It lasted about a Whole minute on the BST.

Trust me, I feel bad that you didn't end up with the card!  

I've been on both ends and I believe we all wish we could help each other out when ever possible... This was just one time that it just didn't work out... 

I am truly sorry Erik...[/QUOTE]

[quote name="t206hound" post=979671]Definitely no hard feelings Denny.  I know that you really worked with me to try to make a deal.  We must have tried half a dozen different combinations of trade and cash.  Sometimes it just doesn't work out.  In the end, everyone involved in the deal should be happy, and that appears to have happened with this card.  Congrats to both the buyer and seller.[/QUOTE]

Thanks Erik... It means a lot to me! I have a card right now that I paid $2200 and the Collector wants to give me $1350 for it... And this is after about 30 emails... He Started at $800:eek:

I'm feeling preety bad right now:(

I Know that You're a good guy and I Really wish that I could of pulled the trigger...

On the Bright side... There is another out there!

AWWWW MAN!!!

:(


i wish that was in your collection!!

Erick, YOU DESERVE THAT CARD....


i'm going to find you another Erick.....;)......

we will get that cobby in yoour collection dude...your someone that helps everyone and i wish i had helped you on this one:o
